meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a parrot.
meanings.sent1: The colorful feathers of the bird were parroty in appearance.
meanings.sent2: The toy parrot had a parroty beak and bright plumage.
meanings.sent3: The parroty puppet entertained the children with its squawks and mimicry.
meanings.sent4: Her parroty laughter echoed through the room, bright and infectious.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the parroty essence of the bird in the painting.

meanings.definition: Imitating or repeating speech or actions in a mechanical or unthinking way.
meanings.sent1: The parroty robot repeated the same phrases over and over.
meanings.sent2: His parroty response showed he wasn't really listening.
meanings.sent3: The parroty alarm clock mimicked the sound of a rooster crowing.
meanings.sent4: Her parroty dance moves mirrored those of the instructor perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The parroty behavior of the students during the drill made the teacher smile.
